pages.text: Often referred to as “veinminer,” this mod allows you to $(thing)automatically break all contiguous blocks of the same type$() as the one you’re targeting. It works with all tools and even your empty hand! You simply need to $(action)hold down the $(k:oreexcavation.key.excavate) key while you mine$() in order to use this power.

pages.title: The GRAVE Key
pages.text: $(italic)Author's Note: What could this bizarre glyph represent?$()
